title: Radgepacket - Volume Four
description: We're back again with yet more of our favourite renegades and radgies. Our ceaseless quest to bring you the the unsigned and the unhinged continues. Radgepacket Four brings you over twenty tales of murder, mayhem and madness from the Inner Citiesat a criminally cheap price If you like your fiction industrial strength then there's something in here for you! Come on...GET RADGE!
author: Danny King
